abstract: What makes something a meme? Or perhaps more importantly, what causes a meme to go viral or even mainstream? Authenticity and spontaneity, says Jonathan Zittrain, a law professor at Harvard who studies the Internet and how people use it. He gave the opening keynote speech at ROFLCon, a conference focused on Internet culture.

headline.main: ROFLCon: The Internet Goes Offline to Talk Web Culture
